api_list.name: Get Pokemon Static Image
api_list.description: Get a static Image by the Pokemon ID Supplied
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poke-data.p.rapidapi.com/pokemon/static/pokeimg/025.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poke-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Pokemon Lookup
api_list.description: Look up a Pokemon by Name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poke-data.p.rapidapi.com/pokemon/lookup/name/Pikachu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poke-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://poke-data.p.rapidapi.com/pokemon/lookup/name/{pokemon_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poke-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a Random Pokemon
api_list.description: Get a random Pokemon and its stats from the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poke-data.p.rapidapi.com/pokemon/lookup/random/pokemon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poke-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
